meaningMnemonic: You walk out on a <radical>cliff</radical>, where you find in the <radical>ground</radical> a <radical>mouth</radical> poking out. It speaks: "It is me, the <kanji>empress</kanji> of these lands!"
readingMnemonic: When you finish unburying the <kanji>empress</kanji>, the first thing she says to you is: "Please, you must hurry and take me to Emperor <reading>こう</reading>いち."
